original_text: For Gaza shall be forsaken, and Ashkelon a desolation: they shall drive out Ashdod at the noon day, and Ekron shall be rooted up.
korean_text: 가사는 버림을 당하며 아스글론은 폐허가 되며 아스돗은 대낮에 쫓겨나며 에그론은 뽑히리라

sentences.original_text: they shall drive out Ashdod at the noon day,
and Ekron shall be rooted up.
